mapper.select: SELECT c.class_id, h.homework_id, h.homework_content, h.homework_date, h.homework_title, h.curriculum_id, s.subject_id, s.subject_name FROM homeworks h JOIN curriculum c ON (h.curriculum_id = c.curriculum_id) JOIN subjects s ON (h.curriculum_id = s.curriculum_id) WHERE h.subject_id = s.subject_id ORDER BY h.homework_id DESC

SELECT h.homework_title, h.homework_date, h.homework_id, c.class_id, s.subject_name FROM homeworks h JOIN curriculum c ON (h.curriculum_id = c.curriculum_id) JOIN users u ON (c.curriculum_id = u.curriculum_id) JOIN subjects s ON (s.curriculum_id = c.curriculum_id) WHERE h.subject_id = s.subject_id AND user_id = #{userid} ORDER BY h.homework_id DESC

SELECT h.homework_id, h.homework_content, h.homework_date, h.homework_title, h.curriculum_id, h.subject_id, t.homework_target_id FROM homeworks h JOIN homework_targets t ON (h.homework_id = t.homework_id) WHERE h.homework_id = #{homeworkId}
SELECT subject_name, subject_id FROM subjects WHERE curriculum_id = #{curriculumId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO homeworks ( homework_id, homework_content, homework_date, homework_title, curriculum_id, subject_id ) VALUES ( homework_id_seq.nextval, #{homeworkContent}, #{homeworkDate}, #{homeworkTitle}, #{curriculumId}, #{subjectId} )
INSERT INTO homework_targets ( homework_target_id, homework_id, curriculum_id ) VALUES ( homework_target_id_seq.nextval, #{homeworkId}, #{curriculumId} )
mapper.select: SELECT homework_id, curriculum_id FROM homeworks WHERE homework_id = ( SELECT max(homework_id) FROM homeworks WHERE curriculum_id = #{curriculumId})
